name: OpportunityContactRole
description: Represents the role that a Contact plays on an Opportunity.
summary: The object {OpportunityContactRole} in the Salesforce application represents the relationship between an opportunity and a contact involved in the sales process. It has attributes such as Id, OpportunityId, ContactId, Role, IsPrimary, CreatedDate, CreatedById, LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedById, SystemModstamp, and IsDeleted. These attributes include information such as the role of the contact in the opportunity, whether they are the primary contact, and details about when the record was created or last modified.
label: Opportunity Contact Role
